meanings.definition: (Zoology) Having the tarsal scopulae divided by a longitudinal line of setae or spines.
meanings.english_definition: (Zoology) Having the tarsal scopulae divided by a longitudinal line of setae or spines.

examples.sentence: The spider was identified as schizopelmous due to the divided scopulae on its tarsi.
examples.translation: そのクモは、跗節の分裂したスコプラによって、schizopelmousであると特定された。

etymology.value: From schizo- (splitting) + pelma (sole of the foot).
